text: @bushwhacker2k if I could thumbs up your comment any more, i would. The statement you are referring to makes me want to tear my skin off. Yes FFXIII's battle system was nice, and the cutscenes were beautiful. great, they captured two of the nice things about games, but really. no towns, a linear story where you can't revisit areas till the end of the game, little exploration until the end as well.. what were they thinking?!
